item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, February 7, 2025 at 11:10 AM UTC
item.description:

9. Announcing the data.gov archive (188 points | 46 comments)
10. Robust autonomy emerges from self-play (81 points | 41 comments)

13. How does life happen when there's barely any light? (26 points | 21 comments)
14. Simulating water over terrain (322 points | 48 comments)

21. There may not be aha moment in R1-Zero-like training (55 points | 6 comments)
22. Aluminum batteries outlive lithium-ion with a pinch of salt (201 points | 116 comments)

24. AI by Hand Exercises in Excel (49 points | 4 comments)

26. Complex Systems and Quantitative Mereology (70 points | 11 comments)
27. Verse (YC W22) Is Hiring ( | hide)

29. Keep 'em (not) separated: detecting discontinuities in grid graphs (16 points | 9 comments)
